articles.author: YURI KAGEYAMA
articles.title: Stock market today: Asian shares are mixed, led by gains in Chinese markets following policy moves - The Associated Press
articles.description: Asian shares are mostly higher, with Chinese stocks extending gains after Beijing announced a raft of policies to support sagging markets. Hong Kong gained 1.2% and Shanghai was up 2%. Benchmarks fell in Tokyo and Seoul. U.S. futures were mixed and oil prices…
articles.content:
TOKYO (AP) Asian shares were mostly higher on Thursday, with Chinese stocks extending gains after Beijing announced a raft of policies to support sagging markets.
